description:
A year after the Rainbow disappeared, life returned to normal. Time unwinds itself and the darkness retreats. It does not, however, vanish. Some people understand that strange events unraveled. For other the quests continue…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Requiem 眠りによって全てが終わる
A Requiem: Nemuri ni Yotte Subete ga Owaru
